title: NET_VAR_DWORD8 Module
description:
NET_VAR_DWORD8 is used for bidirectional transmission of eight 

DWORD from the master to slave and vice versa. The signals DWORD IN1..8 are 

collected and passed to the other side (control) on the same module at the same 

position as OUT1..8 again.

Simultaneously, the on the opposite side (other control) passed input datawords 

passed here as a OUT1..8 again.

ID parameter indicates the current identification number of the module instance. If the 

configuration of the master and the slave program is differently (incorrectly) that ID 

number is passed as a fault in the module NET_VAR_CONTROL.
name: NET_VAR_DWORD8

input.name: X
input.description: NET_VAR data structure for bidirectional data transmission

input.name: ID
input.description: Identification number of the module instance

output.name: OUT1
output.description: Output DWORD value 1 corresponding to input IN1

output.name: OUT2
output.description: Output DWORD value 2 corresponding to input IN2

output.name: OUT3
output.description: Output DWORD value 3 corresponding to input IN3

output.name: OUT4
output.description: Output DWORD value 4 corresponding to input IN4

output.name: OUT5
output.description: Output DWORD value 5 corresponding to input IN5

output.name: OUT6
output.description: Output DWORD value 6 corresponding to input IN6

output.name: OUT7
output.description: Output DWORD value 7 corresponding to input IN7

output.name: OUT8
output.description: Output DWORD value 8 corresponding to input IN8

return_value.description: This function does not return a value.
